Message.MsgText: ERROR_INTELLMGMT_NOT_ENABLED=WXIM0101E: Intelligent Management is not enabled for {1} on node {0}.
Message.Explanation: Intelligent Management must be enabled before you run this command.
Message.UserResponse: Enable Intelligent Management, then run the command again.

Message.MsgText: ERROR_PLUGIN_PROP_NOT_FOUND=WXIM0110E: {0} was not removed from Intelligent Management.
Message.Explanation: The Intelligent Management plug-in property {0} does not exist.
Message.UserResponse: Enter a valid Intelligent Management plug-in property to be removed.

Message.Explanation: The specified trace level is not valid.
Message.UserResponse: Set the trace level to one of the following values: "EMERG", "ALERT", "CRITICAL", "ERROR", "WARNING", "NOTICE", "INFO", "DEBUG", or "OFF".

Message.MsgText: ERROR_REMOTE_CELL_NOT_FOUND=WXIM0109E: {0}:{1} was not added to Intelligent Management.
Message.Explanation: The remote cell {0}:{1} cannot be found.
Message.UserResponse: Add the remote cell {0}:{1} to the Intelligent Management cells of your web server.

Message.MsgText: ERROR_REMOTE_CELL_CONNECTION=WXIM0112E: The function requested from the remote cell {0}:{1} failed.
Message.Explanation: The remote cell {0}:{1} could not be reached.
Message.UserResponse: Check input, including user ID and password. Try again.

Message.MsgText: ERROR_TRACE_CONDITION_VALIDATION=WXIM0104E: An error occurred while evaluating the condition "{0}".
Message.UserResponse: Correct the condition and run the command again.

Message.MsgText: ERROR_NEED_PARENT=WXIM0100E: The node or the web server is missing.
Message.Explanation: The node and web server are required parameters.
Message.UserResponse: Examine the detailed error message and previous entries in the logs to determine the node and web server. Then specify the node and web server.

Message.MsgText: ERROR_INVALID_SCOPE=WXIM0107E: The trace scope is not valid.
Message.Explanation: The only valid trace scope values are "CONTROL" and "REQUEST".
Message.UserResponse: Set the trace scope to "CONTROL" or "REQUEST".

Message.MsgText: ERROR_WEBSERVER_TYPE_INVALID=WXIM0108E: The web server type must be Apache or IHS.
Message.Explanation: Only Apache and IHS web servers can use Intelligent Management.
Message.UserResponse: Use an Apache or IHS web server for Intelligent Management.

Message.MsgText: ERROR_SAVING_INTELLMGMT=WXIM0102E: The Intelligent Management data was not saved.
Message.Explanation: An error occurred while saving the Intelligent Management data.
Message.UserResponse: Check the log files. Save the log files for troubleshooting.

Message.MsgText: ERROR_WEBSERVER_NOT_FOUND=WXIM0103E: {1} on node {0} does not exist.
Message.Explanation: The specified web server cannot be found on the specified node.
Message.UserResponse: Specify the correct node and web server.

Message.Explanation: The command did not complete because the remote cell cannot be reached.
Message.UserResponse: Ensure the remote cell can be reached.

Message.MsgText: ERROR_CELLID_NOT_UNIQUE=WXIM0105E: The cell identifier {0} is already in use.
Message.Explanation: A unique cell identifier is required.

Message.MsgText: ERROR_REMOTE_CELL_DUPLICATE=WXIM0111E: {0}:{1} was not added to Intelligent Management.
Message.Explanation: The remote cell {0}:{1} has already been added.
Message.UserResponse: Add a new remote cell {0}:{1} to the Intelligent Management cells of your web server.
